COMMENT_TX: $Babe Ruth's fly hit a radio speaker horn in right-center and caromed back onto the field; that speaker was out of play and the ball should have been ruled a home run
$Tony Lazzeri thought this was the 3rd out and started to run back to the dugout
ej,dickb101,P,nalld901,Call at HP (Threw ball at umpire) Bill Dickey ejected by HP umpire Dick Nallin after Dickey threw the ball at the umpire
$Jimmie Foxx and Bing Miller both ended up at 3B
$Jimmy Dykes left with a charley horse
